title: The College Cheating Scandal
dc:creator: Queens Podcast Lab
description: Today, The Annex discusses the College Cheating Scandal, in which several celebrities and wealthy people were caught using bribery and cheating to get their children into prestigious schools. Our guests are Anna Mueller (University of Chicago) and Seth Abrutyn (University of British Columbia).

Our guests are Anna Mueller (University of Chicago) and  Seth Abrutyn (University of British Columbia).
